mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, ci.item_id, ci.gid, ci.title, ci.quantity, ci.price FROM cart c LEFT JOIN cart_item ci ON c.cart_id = ci.cart_id
SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, ci.item_id, ci.gid, ci.title, ci.quantity, ci.price FROM cart c LEFT JOIN cart_item ci ON c.cart_id = ci.cart_id WHERE ci.item_id = #{id}
SELECT c.cart_id, c.user_id, ci.item_id, ci.gid, ci.title, ci.quantity, ci.price FROM cart c LEFT JOIN cart_item ci ON c.cart_id = ci.cart_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (cart_id, gid, quantity, price, title) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{gid}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{title})
INSERT INTO cart (user_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_item SET cart_id = #{cartId}, gid = #{gid}, quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{price}, title = #{title} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
